Sentence: 宿題はさっさとやるよう心掛けなさい
Translation: Try to do your homework quickly
Meaning: bear in mind, aim to do, try to do

Sentence: 現在でも多くの国で現役である
Translation: Still in service in many countries today

Sentence: 僕は思いきり働きたい
Translation: I want to work to the best of my ability
Meaning: to heart's content, to one’s best ability

Sentence: 考えたすえに彼との結婚は思い切ることにした
Translation: After thinking about it, I decided not to marry him
Meaning: give up all thoughts, make up one's mind

Sentence: そのように思い切って公表するようになった
Translation: I'm now bold enough to publicize it that way

Sentence: 何をやらせても彼女は割り切って行動している
Translation: No matter what I let her do, she acts divisively.
Meaning: clear cut, clean decision, clear solution

Sentence: ファイルを開き直す必要がなくなります
Translation: No more need to reopen files

Sentence: 高齢者講習や初心者講習も行っている
Translation: There is an advanced class as well as a beginners class

Sentence: 素材の味を生かした料理
Translation: A dish that brings out the taste of the ingredients

Sentence: 一期一会の貴重な機会となることでしょう
Translation: It will be a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity

Sentence: 報告の前篇を記しました
Translation: I have written the first part of the report

Sentence: 一般モデルは後編をお楽しみに
Translation: Please enjoy the second part of the general model.

Sentence: 緊迫した情勢にうまく対処する
我々が対決を見ていることは明らかです
Translation: It is clear we are looking at a showdown
